item.title: Stack Machines for Free
item.description: Previously we saw how to expand seed values into recursive structures given a function that expands a single layer of structure, and how to collapse recursive structures into a single value given a function that consumes a single layer of structure. Here we'll see how to fuse those two steps, to generate a stack machine that simultaneously expands and collapses recursive structures, given just a function for expanding layers and a function for collapsing layers.
